name: Moti Jump: Getting Over The Placeholders
name_original: Moti Jump: Getting Over The Placeholders
description:
Simple yet challenging platformer.

Launch your ball with your mouse, get over the placeholders and reach the goal.

Game is challenging  and do not teach its tricks. Learning them on your own is half the fun:)

Get ready for frustration and great feelings of success.

Game is originaly made for mobile. You can find it on android play store soon!

All comments on this game page and on my twitter (http://twitter.com/games_moti) are much appreciated!
